entries.name: COMPONENT
entries.desc: An Array of the available components for Bundler::URI::File.

entries.name: DEFAULT_PORT
entries.desc: A Default port of nil for Bundler::URI::File.

entries.name: build(args)
entries.desc: Creates a new Bundler::URI::File object from components, with syntax checking.

entries.name: set_host(v)
entries.desc: Protected setter for the host component v.
